channel.title: freelancing on Pietro Grandinetti
channel.description: Recent content in freelancing on Pietro Grandinetti

item.title: My Freelancer Journey
item.description: I was 23 when I heard the word freelancer the first time. I became fascinated with it, and in the following three years I devoted a great deal of energy and passion towards becoming a freelancer. I believe I was able to hit some pretty good milestones, but I also hit some very hard walls along the way. I want now to describe in detail the actions I took from the day I decided to become a freelancer, till the day I stopped.
